tasks.label: Build Fractal WASM (Unix/Bash, Shared Memory)
tasks.command: emcc -msimd128 -std=c++20 -O3 -ffast-math -flto -s SIDE_MODULE=2 -s NODEJS_CATCH_REJECTION=0 -s WASM_BIGINT=0 -Wl,--no-entry -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s SHARED_MEMORY=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_run','_render']" -s ERROR_ON_UNDEFINED_SYMBOLS=0 -s DISABLE_EXCEPTION_CATCHING=1 -o fractal.wasm fractal.cpp decimal.cpp && { TEMP_WASM=$(mktemp -t wasm_opt_XXXXXX); wasm-opt fractal.wasm -o "$TEMP_WASM" -O4 --strip-debug --strip-dwarf --strip-producers --enable-threads --enable-simd && mv "$TEMP_WASM" fractal.wasm; }
tasks.detail: Builds fractal.wasm with Emscripten and wasm-opt for Unix-like systems (Bash/Zsh).

tasks.label: Build FractalUnshared WASM (Unix/Bash, Unshared Memory)
tasks.command: emcc -msimd128 -std=c++20 -O3 -ffast-math -flto -s SIDE_MODULE=2 -s NODEJS_CATCH_REJECTION=0 -s WASM_BIGINT=0 -Wl,--no-entry -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_run','_render']" -s ERROR_ON_UNDEFINED_SYMBOLS=0 -s DISABLE_EXCEPTION_CATCHING=1 -o fractalUnshared.wasm fractal.cpp decimal.cpp && { TEMP_WASM=$(mktemp -t wasm_opt_XXXXXX); wasm-opt fractalUnshared.wasm -o "$TEMP_WASM" -O4 --strip-debug --strip-dwarf --strip-producers --enable-threads --enable-simd && mv "$TEMP_WASM" fractalUnshared.wasm; }
tasks.detail: Builds fractalUnshared.wasm (without shared memory) with Emscripten and wasm-opt for Unix-like systems (Bash/Zsh).

tasks.label: Inject fractalUnshared.wasm Base64 (Unix/Bash)
args: wasm_data=$(cat fractalUnshared.wasm | base64) && sed -i.bak "s|^[[:space:]]*const unsharedWASMData =.*|const unsharedWASMData = \"data:application/wasm;base64,$wasm_data\"|" main.js && rm main.js.bak

tasks.label: Build Fractal WASM (Windows, Shared Memory)
tasks.command: emcc -msimd128 -std=c++20 -O3 -ffast-math -flto -s SIDE_MODULE=2 -s SHARED_MEMORY=1 -s NODEJS_CATCH_REJECTION=0 -s WASM_BIGINT=0 -Wl,--no-entry -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_run','_render']" -s ERROR_ON_UNDEFINED_SYMBOLS=0 -s DISABLE_EXCEPTION_CATCHING=1 -o fractal.wasm fractal.cpp decimal.cpp; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { $TEMP_WASM = [System.IO.Path]::GetTempFileName() + ".wasm"; wasm-opt fractal.wasm -o $TEMP_WASM -O4 --strip-debug --strip-dwarf --strip-producers --enable-threads --enable-simd; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { Move-Item -Path $TEMP_WASM -Destination fractal.wasm -Force; } else { Write-Error "wasm-opt failed."; } } else { Write-Error "emcc failed."; }
tasks.detail: Builds fractal.wasm with Emscripten and wasm-opt for Windows (PowerShell).
